awards.summary:
Awarded for lead development of the JCU Research Portfolio (jcu.me), an
interactive web profile for all researchers at the University.
awards.title: Staff Excellence Award

volunteer.summary:
Local Python programming user and interest group, hosted in North
Queensland.

highlights: Lead developer of numerous University online projects (jcu.me, Research@JCU, JCU Journals)
Project manager and developer of eSpaces.edu.au
work.summary: Web application and system administration (DevOps role).

basics.summary:
David is an experienced web developer and project manager, specialising in
customised applications and content management systems (CMS).  Above all
else, he ensures a client-driven focus to work all undertaken.  David has
specialised knowledge of online collaboration software, web technologies,
security protocols and development practices.

His passions consist of open source software development, security, Linux
and Python programming, though his skills extend to many other aspects of
technology. David contributes back to the community with open-source
software, as well as open programming sessions and presentations.
basics.name: David James Beitey
basics.label: Development & Operations (DevOps)
